channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-15323] allow the user to turn off reduce-side SMB join
item.summary: allow the user to turn off reduce-side SMB join

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Restores parts of the pre- HIVE-10001 code, mostly. Expands the test to ensure the plan is different.
hagleitn can you take a look?

LGTM +1. Couple of comments though (since you're resurrecting code, probably fine): a) There are some checks for whether optraits are null. Other places don't, not sure that's just an oversight. b) If the group by's parent doesn't have an optraits object we init the # reduce sinks to 0. That means it will pass the new check, but likely shouldn't...

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12841203/HIVE-15323.patch

ERROR: -1 due to no test(s) being added or modified.
